tool_description: Process images and binary documents using machine learning methods, for analytics, search and other applications.
name: plot2txt
title: plot2txt

api_list.name: CSPAN video search
api_list.description: A demo for the wav2txt API method, showing various chunks of searchable speech from a CSPAN video. JSON output is base64 encoded.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://plot2txt1.p.rapidapi.com/cspan-video-search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "plot2txt1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://plot2txt1.p.rapidapi.com/cspan-video-search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "plot2txt1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Arxiv figure search
api_list.description: Search and retrieve arxiv figure data eg,. labels, data ranges and x-y points. This example was created using the simple scatter plot API method, output is JSON, with links to detected plots and output QC images showing centers of fitted Gaussians.

required_parameters.name: label
required_parameters.description: Combined x and y axis text labels

required_parameters.name: source
required_parameters.description: The arxiv journal source eg., astro

optional_parameters.name: skey
optional_parameters.description: The start time for next returned query object

optional_parameters.name: ymax
optional_parameters.description: Upper bound for y axis values

optional_parameters.name: xmin
optional_parameters.description: Lower bound for x axis values

optional_parameters.name: xmax
optional_parameters.description: Upper bound for x axis values

optional_parameters.name: ymin
optional_parameters.description: Lower bound for y axis values
